attributes.action: Yorkshire and The Humber Regional Assembly
attributes.additional_details: Following the Scottish Referendum and the Primeminister saying that more powers will be devolved to english regions, we call on the British Parliament to hold a referendum for the people of Yorkshire and the Humber to ask if they want a regional assembly and more control over spending in the yorkshire and humber area.

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: Establishment of an elected Yorkshire council with devolved powers from Westminster

Created by: Matthew Allen

Closing: 30/03/2015
